page.title: 06BIOGRAPHY:LYNDA USHER.
page.content: INVERMORISTON:INTERESTING PEOPLE. LYNDA USHER,KNITWEAR DESIGNER. LYNDA has lived here for 12 years. Shespent 7 years training as a graphic designer and became interested in wool and natural dyes and designs inspired by the environment of Glenmoriston. Her knitwear business grew from a hobby with the help of the highlands and Islands Development Board into a full time job.Her designs have been shown in London,New York as well as attrade fairs in Scotland,and she now has a contract with a Japanese manu- facturer to design two lines each year. Lynda finds Invermoriston a good place to work with easy access to specialist services she needs,either in Inverness or an hour or two away by road or air.SHE employs about 100 knitters throughout the highlands.
